title: The Integrated Self
description: A comprehensive journey to wholeness across mind, body, relationships, and soul

modules.title: The Case for Integration
modules.description: Understanding fragmentation and the path to wholeness

modules.title: Mapping Your Fragments
modules.description: Discovering the parts of yourself that have split off

modules.title: The Mind Dimension
modules.description: Integrating thoughts, beliefs, and mental patterns

modules.title: The Emotional Dimension
modules.description: Welcoming the full range of feeling

modules.title: The Shadow Dimension
modules.description: Reclaiming what you've rejected about yourself

modules.title: The Soul Dimension
modules.description: Connecting to meaning, purpose, and the transcendent

modules.title: Living Integrated
modules.description: Bringing integration into every area of life

questions.question: According to the course, fragmentation primarily results from:
options: Adaptive responses to pain, trauma, and social pressure

questions.question: The shadow contains:
options: Both rejected positive and negative aspects of self

questions.question: Integration is best understood as:
options: An ongoing process of welcoming and connecting

questions.question: The body dimension of integration involves:
options: Reconnecting with embodied experience and sensation

questions.question: Relational integration means:
options: Showing up authentically while remaining connected
